attr.title: Legbreaker
attr.desc: A puzzle platformer where you can only jump twice.
attr.desc_md: A puzzle platformer where you can only jump twice.
attr.inst: You can download Legbreaker for free at: https://almbkn.itch.io/legbreaker -- grab the Legbreaker_Win.zip version and extract it. Among the extracted files, there's a file named Legbreaker.pck; copy this into the port's gamedata directory.
attr.inst_md: You can download Legbreaker for free at: https://almbkn.itch.io/legbreaker -- grab the *Legbreaker_Win.zip* version and extract it. Among the extracted files, there's a file named *Legbreaker.pck*; copy this into the port's *gamedata* directory.
